short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your Jira Cloud board fullscreen and other various goodies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple tool will add an icon to your Jira board page where you can choose between: 
-Toggle Jira board fullscreen
-Expand or collapse all swimlanes in your board
